attributes.comment:
Please reconisder the increase in these fees. International adoption is a long and
expensive process. Increasing these fees adds to the frustration and expense
incurred by, generally, you middle class families who are trying hard to build a
family. These families are often already doing fundraisers, securing 2nd jobs and
taking out loans to be able to pay the expenses associated with the adoption.
With the current increasing wait times for China and other countries, families are
already having to have some of these documents re-issued, which is already
increasing the expense. We are currently adopting an orphan from China and
understand the financial strain this can cause for a family. Please don't increase
these fees. Thank you for your consideration.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Nancy Wartman
